title: Strengthening Customer Service Practice Competencies: Discussion-Based Foreign Literature Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design discussion strategies to critically analyze themes in foreign literary works
Learners can structure activities that promote critical thinking by applying teaching methods utilizing counterarguments and debates
Learners can plan and implement mobile-friendly mini-debate projects (e.g., 5-minute mock trials, text-based arguments)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
